price: (Rántí) nígbà tí o jí kúrò lọ́dọ̀ àwọn ara ilé rẹ ní ìdájí kùtùkùtù, tí ò ń fi àwọn onígbàgbọ́ òdodo sí àyè ibùjagun, Allāhu ni Olùgbọ́, Onímọ̀.
arabic: وَإِذۡ غَدَوۡتَ مِنۡ أَهۡلِكَ تُبَوِّئُ ٱلۡمُؤۡمِنِينَ مَقَٰعِدَ لِلۡقِتَالِۗ وَٱللَّهُ سَمِيعٌ عَلِيمٌ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: wa-idh ghadawta min ahlika tubawwi-u al-mu'minīna maqāʿida lil'qitāli wal-lahu samīʿun ʿalīmun
